title: GeologicUnitOccurrenceInterpretation
description:
Interpretation of a sequence of geologic units actually observed (interpreted)  along or inside a representation, the representation can be 
•	1D such as a well or an arbitrary line
•	2D like a cross section
•	3D like a entire model or a group of fault blocks
It is typically based on a stratigraphic column rank but can include more units (example intrusive bodies), duplicated units (repeated sequence along a well or lines), or less units (Eroded or non-deposited).
An ordering criteria indicates the reason for the order (age, apparent depth or measured depth).
